name: Ld30pde
body:
### Ludum Dare 30 Attempt
## Theme "Connected Worlds"
To be honest the theme has stumped me a little bit. I'm going to work from this dictionary meaning:
> a part or aspect of human life or of the natural features of the earth, in particular.

So human life and natural features.
The ideas I have had so far are quite... flowery.  Even my first thing to do was get a flower on the screen.

## Technology: Google Dart
Well I work in it all the time, heck even doing client side stuff right now.  Seemed sensible.  Thought I would kick its tyres a bit without work's code library.
Also git.

## Links
* [Ludum Dare 30](http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/2014/08/20/welcome-to-ludum-dare-30/)
* [Google Dart](https://www.dartlang.org/)
* [Colour Scheme Created via paletton.com](http://paletton.com/#uid=30G0u1kd+uc3nNl7DEjkdoYpskZkb6Bu1-+768QMgqrrmhirkfUvv4aXDadKMk+oEq+fh)

## Diary
23rd Aug 14 3:41AM Austin, Tx
Rocky start... I was trying to use Chrome Dev Editor and already missing things like autocomplete and going to definition for stuff in packages.  Spent ages just getting a blank canvas sizing properly, then defining colours and a safe area, the drawing a single flower.

So for the moment I am still in. I am going to see if I can get a latest version hosted on the site and sleep on it.
If I make good progress for the rest of Saturday I'll stay in... if I do not have something playable and a little entertaining at some point on Saturday I will bail and just enjoy Sunday.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
